sentence.Network_en: The anti - spasmodic properties of Rooibos help relieve digestive stress, stomach ulcers, nausea, constipation and heartburn.

sentence.Network_en: Since Rooibos contains no acid it makes a good beverage for people prone to kidney stones.
sentence.Network_cn: 自Rooibos不 包含草酸它使一个很好的饮料的人,易患肾结石.

sentence.Network_en: Rooibos helps us healthy , calms convulsion, prevents aging, improves anemia, eases diarrhea and relieves allergic symptom.

encyclopedia.content: ROOIBOS TEA【路易波士】 产品名称 学名：Aspalathus Linears, 是豆科灌木、针叶状的抗酸性植物。 产地 在南非开普敦北方大地，200公里以北Cedarberg山上土生土长的原始植物当地人称为 "路易波士" ( Rooibos ) 即 "红灌木" 之意（又称Aspalathus Linearis），这种芳香的植物属于豆科，长于山坡上、高原、平原与山谷。 当地人将其制成日常饮品。 品质特点 路易波士茶由于无咖啡因、低丹宁酸、天然增甜成分及丰

means.word_mean: 1. South African shrub having flat acuminate leaves and yellow flowers; leaves are aromatic when dried and used to make an herbal tea
